venue.address_1: 33 Stanhope St. (in the alley behind Mistrale between Clarendon and Berkely and Columbus)
venue.name: Brahmin

item.description:
Jan R. is hosting this event, thanks Jan.

We will try a new venue for this afterwork. Please join fellow Sitzundjiber members and their guests for drinks and conversation at The Brahmin.

Light appetizers will be provided compliments of the Sitzunjibers social club. 

Directions

 T Green Line - exit Copley Station walk to Clarendon St and left on Stanhope Street

Orange Line – Back Bay stop, exit the Clarendon Street exit. Left on Clarendon Street and right on Stanhope Street

Parking - Public parking lot at 100 Clarendon Street.

telephone number for The Brahmin is (617) 723- 3131
item.name: Our January Afterwork
